selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the ages of the two individuals from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the text containing the ages from the provided image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the age gap between the two individuals.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to subtract the age of Person 2 from the age of Person 1 to find the age gap.
